name: Ballistic Challenge
description:
BALLISTIC CHALLENGE   for MSX

A "10 Liner" with physics engine.

GAMEPLAY

You have a "cannon" that shoots bouncy projectiles. Your goal is to hit the cannonball on the two opposing walls. Each time you achieve this you will advance a level.
Avoid hitting obstacles!

 If you run out of ammunition and a collision occurs, it's "GAME OVER"!

It will be victorious who can get through all 10 levels before the ammo ends.

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys: controls the angle and shooting power 

Space bar: shoot

Play it online here: https://msxpen.com/codes/-LbZb-5EUz0UaBiwN3Oc
